name: Visions Electronics
address: Visions Electronics, 1672 SE Marine Dr, Vancouver, BC V5P 2R6

featured_reviews.review_id: I wouldn't even give single star if that was possible. Bought a Dyson vacuum and they upsold the extended warranty. I bought it like an idiot. That vacuum broke in summer, I brought it to the shop first they looked at me like I shouldn't have brought the vacuum for repairs. They took the vacuum from me and I was told it can take 2-4 weeks. Now it's been over 3 months without any answer. Every time I call they have different answer and assure me that they will call me back with update, which never happens. If this is because of corporate or extended warranty company then shame on them to put your staff and paying customers through this much hassle. I had to buy another vacuum because of this. Absolutely terrible service.

featured_reviews.review_id: I came in to purchase a Samsung QLED TV and was helped by George Chaplin. He was very knowledgeable and patient with us while walking through our different options. George definitely went above and beyond to provide us with the best service. Thank you George for your help, we really appreciate it!
featured_reviews.review_text: I came in to purchase a Samsung QLED TV and was helped by George Chaplin. He was very knowledgeable and patient with us while walking through our different options. George definitely went above and beyond to provide us with the best service. Thank you George for your help, we really appreciate it!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Definitely a memorable experience with Rhythm the store manager.  We happened to go into the store looking at purchasing a fireplace that we had to special order.  While we were there we saw that you had a better deal for the Frame TV 65 inch that we purchased the day before from Bestbuy.  It wasn't too much of a difference in price but the service was definitely different.  He explained more details about the TV and told us why we should buy the warranty.  I told him that we didn't buy the warranty at Best Buy because they didn't really have anyone that's was experienced enough to sell me the warranty other than telling me what the price was.  So with that said he spent the time with us gave us all the benefits about the TV and explained to us that if we bought the 5 year warranty and didn't use the warranty in 5 years that we would get a store credit to buy anything we wanted in the store. This definitely was a great selling feature and after that experience we bought the TV with the warranty from Rhythm and told him we will pay first and pick up the TV tomorrow as we needed to return the TV we bought from Bestbuy first as we didn't have space.  Thank you for a wonderful experience and we will definitely be buying more from Rhythm from SE marine Drive Visions.

Thanks, Donald

featured_reviews.review_id: I am glad that George pick up my call when I call in for stock check. He has been very helpful providing professional advice on choosing the right TV for my home. He went through all possible options for my need. Being a responsible adviser and documentation was fast when I need to adjust my order detail. Great purchase with great price!

He went through all possible options for my need. Being a responsible adviser and documentation was fast when I need to adjust my order detail. Great purchase with great price!

featured_reviews.review_id: We have been shopping at Visions Electronics on Marine Drive with George for 15 years.  We have bought all our TVs from George and our parents too.  With George's knowledge and experience each TV got better and better including our newest one last week. The picture is incredible.  We know we can rely on George and his excellent service.
featured_reviews.review_text: We have been shopping at Visions Electronics on Marine Drive with George for 15 years.  We have bought all our TVs from George and our parents too.  With George's knowledge and experience each TV got better and better including our newest one last week. The picture is incredible.  We know we can rely on George and his excellent service.

featured_reviews.review_id: Excellent sale on Nikon binoculars at Visions on Marine Drive in south Vancouver. Very friendly and helpful sales person - got all my info quickly, and when I got home there was already an email with the invoice and order (special order item!). And the store was roomy enough that I could take my bicycle in, without getting in the way of customers or staff. Would highly recommend.
featured_reviews.review_text: Excellent sale on Nikon binoculars at Visions on Marine Drive in south Vancouver. Very friendly and helpful sales person - got all my info quickly, and when I got home there was already an email with the invoice and order (special order item!). And the store was roomy enough that I could take my bicycle in, without getting in the way of customers or staff. Would highly recommend.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Rythum and the team at visions helped me equip my home with tv's, sound bars and other equipment,

Process was easy from start to finish and Rythum was very patient and informative on the topic and products.

He also price matched a competitors price and was able to get me installation a lot sooner,

All in all,

What a wonderful experience and I will be shopping here again soon,

Thanks Visions!

featured_reviews.review_id: George Chaplain helped me with the purchase of a tv and wall mount.  It's been a over a decade since my last purchase. Needless to say I'm not very tech savvy, so it's taken me awhile to get to all the features. When I needed help months after the purchase, George came through once again with his exemplary customer.  I felt like a valued customer long after my purchase and will return for any future audio visual purchases.
